mapper.sql: id, object_id, object_type, business_id, version, create_at, update_at, stateflag
mapper.update: UPDATE t_business_obj_re SET stateflag = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_business_obj_re where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND stateflag = 0

select
from t_business_obj_re where object_type= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND object_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND stateflag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_business_obj_re (object_id, object_type, business_id) values (#{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{objectType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update t_business_obj_re
object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
object_type = #{objectType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND stateflag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT bor.object_id FROM t_business_obj_re bor LEFT JOIN object_user_relation our ON our.object_id=bor.object_id LEFT JOIN business b ON b.id=bor.business_id WHERE bor.object_type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND b.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND our.object_type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND b.stateflag = 0 AND bor.stateflag = 0 AND bor.object_id not IN ( SELECT tct.object_id FROM t_company_team tct LEFT JOIN t_company_team_re tctr ON tctr.company_team_id=tct.id LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tut ON tut.user_id=tctr.accepter_id WHERE tct.object_type=#{type} AND tut.user_type IN (31,32,33) AND tctr.`status`=1 AND tct.object_type=#{type} AND tut.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) AND (our.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR b.create_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) GROUP BY bor.object_id
SELECT bor.object_id from business b LEFT JOIN t_business_obj_re bor ON bor.business_id=b.id WHERE bor.object_type=#{objectType} AND b.`status`=1 GROUP BY bor.object_id
